-Linkedin url bug fixed
Note: we're currently working on the icloud feature to improve it. In the meantime we temporarily disable the feature.

-We improved iCloud feature
-Do not forget to leave a comment in order to help us to offer a better app

-We improved iCloud feature
-Do not forget to leave a comment in order to help us to offer a better app

We improved iCloud feature and fixed some problems linked with iCloud.
For the users who met issues with iCloud we strongly recommand to clean iCloud container for Resume designer Pro (Settings=>General=>Local storage and iCloud), remove the app, and download
it again from the store. It should solve most of the issues.
Our deep apologies for the inconveniences. We work hard to offer the best possible experience with the app.

We improved iCloud feature and fixed some problems linked with iCloud.
For the users who met issues with iCloud we strongly recommand to clean iCloud container for Resume designer Pro (Settings=>General=>Local storage and iCloud), remove the app, and download
it again from the store. It should solve most of the issues.
Our deep apologies for the inconveniences. We work hard to offer the best possible experience with the app.

We have worked hard on this version which offers lots of new features:
-new Resume: Marketing and Social networks
-possibility of using charts for the skills
-possibility of using icons for Hobbies and interests
-possibility of adding a handwritten signature
-new section 'More about me' to precise date of birth, marital status, nationality etc.
-user interface improved for large smartphones and iPads

We fixed minor bugs and improved the general performance

You can now send all the resumes from one device to another one using Airdrop.
